TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Articles.Content:
36 minutes ago, Damdelittle said:

The scatter is not really working for me it is just all white and yellow every where

 

Could you provide an image?
Can you tell me the settings I need to change to have the atmosphere less opaque?

Alt+f10 menu is not working for me on main menu, i mean it appears and disappears but buttons on it won't work.

Still i haven't tested it on fully stock game so it may be because of another mod or something.

On 5/12/2020 at 10:46 AM, SkiRich said:

Can you tell me the settings I need to change to have the atmosphere less opaque?

I'm getting this problem too. I've found that tinkering with the Scattering Exposure can help. It starts at 0.23, try something like 0.005 and then adjust up/down to your taste.

Also be aware of the config points up at the top of the settings - Kerbin has different config points for zero, 1000 and 250,000 altitudes. I dialed down the opacity at 250,000, but when I was flying at 80,000, it was still all white & pearly because I hadn't edited the 1000 config point.

I hope that helps. I also increased the Extinction tint a bit to breath a bit more colour back into the world. My next task is to figure out how to save the settings! The buttons don't seem to be doing the trick, so it might be a matter of editing the config files once one works out what looks nice.

Hello, I sadly have a bug to report that a few people using Spectra have reported.

When "EVEIntegration_preserveCloudColors = True" on Kerbin and Spectra is installed, the clouds on the main menu turn all rainbow colored:

I haven't been able to replicate the bug on my end for some reason, but two different people reported this to me after I released an update that changed it to True. Setting it to False reportedly fixes this.

Edited May 15, 2020 by Avera9eJoe
